sense.gloss: to step back, to move back, to retreat
to withdraw (from the presence of a superior), to leave, to exit
to resign, to retire, to quit

sdata.j: ↑進↑↓すす↓むべきか↑退↑↓|しりぞ↓く|べきか、はっきりとはわからなかった。
sdata.e: I was uncertain whether to advance or to retreat.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑大統領↑↓だいとうりょう↓の↑職↑↓しょく↓から↑強制↑↓きょうせい↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑退↑↓|しりぞ↓く|べきか。
sdata.e: Ought he to be forced out of the presidency?

sdata.j: おい、いい↑加減↑↓かげん↓パンツネタはやめとけよな、↑読者↑↓どくしゃ↓が↑退↑↓|しりぞ↓く|、ドンビキ。
sdata.e: Hey, it's about time you quit it with the panty jokes. You'll put off the readers, you creeper!

sdata.j: ↑退↑↓|しりぞ↓く|のは↑無理↑↓むり↓、だって↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑本質↑↓ほんしつ↓だ。
sdata.e: I can't quit it, it's my personality.

sdata.j: ↑退↑↓|しりぞ↓く|のは↑無理↑↓むり↓、だって↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑本質↑↓ほんしつ↓だ。
sdata.e: I can't give in; that's just how I am.
